resources.string: We are happy to welcome you, and now you are now part of our family!
This app was built for fundraising and for your education as a student. Help the teachers now using our app through ads monetization and in-app purchase
With the help of the students of Bantayan Science High School. We made a reviewer from grade 7 to grade 12.
With the help of ALGOBTY members they made this app in to a reality.
